column3: â€œI saw Huckleberry in the clinic a couple days ago and after smelling and looking at it decided it would be the next strain that i would try. The smell was very unique berry scent that explodes out into your nose when you put your nose to the jar, the smell for some reason went very well with the name 'huckleberry'. Then I got home and rolled a joint and packed a few bowls. I expected, especially since the nugs were v...â€
â€œNice berry taste, small buds. Reminds me of blueberry. Helps with pain, felt rather lazy and sleepy after smoking out of bongâ€

â€œDispensary: Desert Rose Phoenix 

Strain: Platinum Huckleberry 

I have this sudden urge to speak with a Carolina accent, paint myself blue, throw on a jazzy hat, and watch Hannah - Barbera cartoons.â€

â€œHuckleberry and Blueberry Skunk are remarkably similar even though they are very obviously different strains as you can tell from the nugs. Blueberry Skunk nugs are huge and incredibly dense and bright green with orange hairs, Huckleberry is almost purple, small dense nugs.

Huckleberry hits much like Blueberry, straight to the head, but there is more cerebral effect, and its much, much tastier. both incredible bud...â€
â€œOMG! This is hilarious! If anyone saw Katt Williams (stand-up) he made a joke about how a bad bag of bud would be called Huckabee"...i just had to laugh ...plus im litâ€"

â€œI love this strain! Its perfect for a nature walk or another outdoor experience! A very aware and happy high with the amazing taste is great! I would reccomend smoking out of a wooden pipe if possible!â€

â€œfirst impressions are very positive, uplifting but still enough of a euphoric tickle to you giggle. After a few minutes the Indica properties became a little more dominant, very relaxing in the body but not cloudy or confusing in a cerebral way. Highly recommended. Great for daytime veteran smokers.â€

â€œGreat strain, the high makes it feel like your floating on air. The aroma is very sweet and berry just like the name suggest. Also its worth mentioning that the after taste is very fruit and you can actually taste a hint of huckleberry!â€

â€œI generally like this strain , Illinois strain tested at 21% THC . it's a tad above average like 3.5/5 . It has a strange taste like no other cannabis I've tried , not a bad taste per se but def it's own flavor. It's a hybrid that is just about 50:50 , don't expect to be couch locked or up and giggle . U will be neither . U most likely will be somewhere in the middle , mellow and calmâ€

â€œGreat strain, the high makes it feel like your floating on air. The aroma is very sweet and berry just like the name suggest. Also its worth mentioning that the after taste is very fruit and you can actually taste a hint of huckleberry!â€

â€œSlight berry smell .. Mild smoke that is a good night time med before bed .. Trichome's and red hairs cover the tight buds and a nice berry aroma when broken open .. Buds tested at just over 25% which gives ample back pain relief ..â€

â€œFor huckleberry, this actually does a good representation of the smell! Beautiful tasty buds although a little harsh. I felt very relaxed and happy. Took my mind of the symptoms of my auto immune disease. Highly recommend. Thanks Lionheart!â€
â€œI love this. I can smoke it and still function through out the day. It's a great one for me to use and relieve pain as wellâ€

â€œGives you some energy without feeling anything but totally relaxed. More sativa than indica for sure. Hard to sleep if you do it right before bed. Wonderful blueberry smell, tastes great. Allows for FUN with friends.â€

â€œGood option if you want to be functional and not too stoned. Found this to be clear headed and uplifting. Very smooth smoke. Would recommend this to people looking to get stuff done in an uplifted state of mind and/or in need of some mild pain relief. Mild buzz but it lasts. 3.5/5â€
â€œVery nice high. Super relaxed until you sober up or pass out lol.â€
â€œVery nice high. Super relaxed until you sober up or pass out lol.â€
â€œI love this. I can smoke it and still function through out the day. It's a great one for me to use and relieve pain as wellâ€
â€œthis strain is great if you love listening to music and makes you happyâ€
â€œThe creator of this didn't even want it to be cultivated by anyone but himself. I've never seen it out of Shasta County til I read the comments here.â€
â€œYummy tummy yum yum!!!!! Sweeter and more candy-like flavor than DJ short with more or an indica body effect. Yum!â€
â€œVery Pleasant taste and bouquet. The high is quite happy with an emphasis on the Sativa laughy-taffy" affects..! Absolutely
column4: NO anxiety or "Sativa-Hyper" affect at all.  In fact
column5: it is quite helpful to my anxiety
column6: and more closely resembles an "Indica" effect.  On a pain alleviating scale I'd have to say that it brought my pain levels down to a 3 - 2 which is great for severe low back or leg pain conditions..!  I'v...â€"

column3: â€œVery pleasant- true stand out for me.  Easy on the lungs, increases ability to accomplish tasks/projects.  Great motivator, helps me feel better to get things done when I am sick.  Great to cook with also.â€
â€œPretty fucking nice. The high lasts pretty long and it made me really happy and relaxed. I would recommend this if you are gonna be chilling with good friends and vibes.â€

â€œhave this strain in a different but very similar breed. Huckleberry kush is a nice daytime smoke so I figured I would put my review in this strain. energetic but calming high with more indica than sativa.  good taste with good buzz.â€
â€œthis strain is great if you love listening to music and makes you happyâ€
â€œGood clean head high. Productive.â€
â€œOregon grown huc is the best !â€

â€œHuckleberries is what I call her now what a treat to have this strain.Remind me of a Razzle Berry blow pop candy so much flavor. Clear head sativa dominant hybrid. Great for day time pain relief or anxiety relief. Picked up from in El Mirage AZ. Genetics feel like blueberry'/ Cindy 99â€
â€œTasty but only has about 80% strength in the Platinum Huckleberry. But very relaxing.â€

â€œMigraine pain comin on; nausea 6 when I medicated round 2200 or so. takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (a must for me). Body high exactly what I needed. Head high very heavy which is what I wanted. Tastes sweet like berries. You're gonna go to sleep on dis one. Fell asleep fast! Highly recommend for nighttime use for pain/nausea/insomnia. :-)â€

â€œHuckleberry is an indica-dominant strain that has all the qualities an indica should. Although not particularly heavy, this strain is relaxed and centered.  While smoking this strain, I could feel my mind slowing down. This is one of those strains where the mental and physical effects are basically identical. A very comfortable high, this strain would be great for kicking back and relaxing. Those looking to use canna...â€

â€œi just had this great huckleberry strain. 
Man it was so nice to smoke this strain, it's awesome for my day time use and has me felling great for the day, like sunshiny day just for me lol.  thanks MedEx and friends there so helpfulâ€

Just know you is goin to sleep in dis one! :-)â€

â€œUndoubtedly the best smelling and tasting strain I have ever had. Smells like straight berries and tastes like them too. The effect is an amazing euphoric experience that lasts long and hits hard!! Will DEFINITELY be buying more of this!â€

â€œGood strain; has a lovely aroma, looks beautiful, and smokes nicely. The taste and smells do have hints of berries and a sweet flavour. Didn't know how I'd feel about this when I first tried it but it's a newly favorite. Keeps me relaxed and in a very pleasant mood, great strain to smoke during the middle of the day.â€

While smoking this strain, I could feel my mind slowing down. This is one of those strains where the mental and physical effects are basically identical. A very comfortable high, this strain would be great for kicking back and relaxing. Those looking to use canna...â€

â€œFantastic strain. Great mild high. Perfect for daytime shopping, chores, workout, etc. My new go to strain on weekend days to get things done and fun doing them. I experienced no paranoia at all as some have stated.â€
â€œ-PURPLE BELT BUD-Tasted and smelled like huckleberries and got me high as fudgeroonies! And thats pretty highâ€

â€œI bought some Oregon Huckleberry grown by Williams Wonder Farms and the buds were nice and tight and dense, had a great fruity smell and the smoke was incredibly smooth with a nice relaxing high that lastedâ€
â€œgood flavor. wasnt necessarily in a top 10. but pick it up if you can!â€
â€œSuper good sativa dominant strain, great for relaxing and getting work done, always makes me super focused and relaxed.â€

â€œtried this strain and it is a very potent berry smell I have a high tolerance to marijuana as I smoke it constantly due to medical reasons and I must say this is in my top 5 favorite strains I've had I defiantly recommend it take small hits first if your not used to smokingâ€

â€œThis beauty made its way out to the east coast recently. This strain smells not so great and smoke like dirt, but will give you a euphoric high on the level of high grade blue dream. HIGHLY RECOMMENDEDâ€
â€œGreat sativa/hybrid strain. Berry taste and aroma.â€

â€œbought this from artizen,thought it would have more colors like purple but no just plain bright green. anyways this is strait fire!  I'd say 60/40 sativa leaning hybrid,with get shit done qualities and a relaxing back end that goes great with a beer. nothing special bout the taste or smell but a very good hybrid if your bored and wanna try one of the other million strains out there. don't sleep on the indica qualitie...â€
â€œgreat strain very mild strain has more of a fruity aroma packs a little throat hit but all around great strain very happy with itâ€
â€œvery good strain to have when  waking  up in the morning for wake n bake to start the day off rightâ€
â€œWonderful aroma and taste. Great hybrid that didn't limit my functioning too much.â€
â€œMy local spot had this. It was labeled as an indica dominant but I feel a very balanced hybrid here. Smoked like some blueberry with hints of sweet citrus. Good medical strain.â€

â€œThis beauty made its way out to the east coast recently. This strain smells not so great and smoke like dirt, but will give you a euphoric high on the level of high grade blue dream. HIGHLY RECOMMENDEDâ€

â€œI bought some Oregon Huckleberry grown by Williams Wonder Farms and the buds were nice and tight and dense, had a great fruity smell and the smoke was incredibly smooth with a nice relaxing high that lastedâ€

â€œI was Def. Blown away by Huckleberry. Some serious Strawberry Haze & some dank indica I believe the shop owner said Super King Kush. Sounds about right had me at a great sativa but long lasting like a indi.
Bringing this back to Chi. :-Dâ€

â€œThe Huckleberry made the pain go away. Taken one bowl after work, it was just like the description. Compare it to a bowl of Fruity Pebbles, but like, not Fruity Pebbles, but, like, the generic, off-brand store kind. You will be active for 2-ish hours, no crash after munchies for me.â€
â€œSo delicious. Smells and tastes just like a huckleberry.â€
â€œSmooth and HITS the pain RIGHT away! Excellent...Tasty too!â€

â€œVery delicate flavor, smooth texture. If someone were to walk in the room after a blaze session, the visitor might not notice any odor, and might not notice anyone was smoking at all. Calm, clear, assertive, not sleepy.â€
â€œGreat medicine for pain and headaches.â€

I'd say 60/40 sativa leaning hybrid,with get shit done qualities and a relaxing back end that goes great with a beer. nothing special bout the taste or smell but a very good hybrid if your bored and wanna try one of the other million strains out there. don't sleep on the indica qualitie...â€

â€œWOW!!! This bud is the shizznizzle!! The terpenes are just out of control. One of the most flavorful and aroma packed flowers that i have had the pleasure of smoking. And such a pretty bud too. from the moment you open the jar you had me.  A +.  10/10!!â€

â€œWoah! I need to be careful with this strain. If you think too much, it can set you off into a feeling of paranoia and anxiety. That's why a star is gone. Besides that, the more time passes the easier and less cerebral the effects are. I did feel a tingle rush down from the top of my head to my legs. The hit from this one is very different and will collect to your lungs like a diesel/chemical and somewhat make you hav...â€
â€œgreat strain very mild strain has more of a fruity aroma packs a little throat hit but all around great strain very happy with itâ€
â€œGreat sativa/hybrid strain. Berry taste and aroma.â€
â€œSuper good sativa dominant strain, great for relaxing and getting work done, always makes me super focused and relaxed.â€
â€œHuckleberry is a great strain.  It's not too strong, so you can get things done, but it makes me happy and relaxed and takes away back pain.  Tasty too!â€
â€œI am new to smoking, and this is my third type of bud I have tried and definitely my favorite one to dayâ€
â€œTotally upliftingâ€
â€œSmoked this during work and wow it was very uplifting the first 3 hits.â€
â€œExcellent. Great head buzz and numbness and tingling through the body. Delicious blueberry muffin taste and smell. Also a very earthy flavor.â€
â€œGreat daytime strain. Helps focus!â€
â€œVery nice all over high! Uplifting energetic!â€
â€œIt's a very mellow, low energy high. Sorta sloth like. I had an ID dominant strain and it was very relaxing while maintaining a clear head.â€

â€œthis is perfect the smell and taste are very fruity and the buzz is awesome i smoke  a lot with a bong and i dont have to take 3-4-5hit to be high just one and everything is ok .Perfect strain ,will buy againâ€

column3: â€œCemiitx qemu... The Nimiipuu love, Love, LOVE this strain. If we could get a WASHINGTON grower to master the strain they would be set 4 life as the Pacific Northwest Natives would ravage the beautiful berry nuggsâ€
â€œI hadn't slept for almost 48 hours and this was the first strain that allowed me to sleep all night. I very relaxing high and it tasted pretty fruity out of a clean piece.â€
â€œgood. nice hits.brah.â€
â€œsweet and condensed budsâ€
â€œVery awesome strain. CBC content is higher than I normally get and LOVED it. There was paranoid at all!!! Very happy with this bud. Smooth smoking and lovely taste ğŸ’šâ€
â€œVery tasty strain with a great high. The batch I got was amazing but burned too fast. Only negative bout this strainâ€
â€œDecent stuff. Not the best bud I've ever smoked, but it's definitely doing the job. I feel it rather strongly in both head and body alike.â€
â€œripped out of the bong was very high for about a good half hour felt very energetic and creativeâ€
â€œPrefect for nerve problems and spasms. Heavyish stone but clear. Lovely flower.â€
â€œVery relaxing while still being energetic. Looks and smells great too!â€
â€œDynasty genetics shout outâ€

â€œNice mild buzz.  Very functional herbal, good for day time use and when you just want to chill but not be couch locked. 
This batch smokes well, no coughing but a little rough on the throat. 
Did give me the munchies.â€
â€œShot me over the skies.â€

â€œThis is a tasty strain, just not quite my cup of tea.  It had a little bit more head/psych effect than I prefer to have.  The body aspect to it was nice, feeling less tension in shoulders and neck.  If you like a little more of a head high, than say bubble berry, I would recommend it.â€
â€œNectar $4, berry smell and sweet smoke flavor. A little hash after smoking a few bowls. Overall a great blunt/ rolling weed.â€
â€œthis strain was a super strong hitter for me. only smoking 1/8 worth, i was and have been continuously toasty for the past 8 hours.â€

â€œI had huckleberry in Arizona a few months ago and it had a beautiful distinct smell and now im in South Africa, ive got Citrus Kush and its smell and taste are so similiar...possibly part of the genetics .... who knows. love the strain. by far my favorite smelling.â€

â€œImmediate, strong cerebral high that's mostly in the head. Strong wakefulness with wide-eyed pupil dilation (mega red-eye). The sativa intensity is more laid-back thrilling than anxious. It feels deceivingly clear-minded.

You feel cool, mature. Nothing fazes you. It has a distant body stone. Thoughts are inordinately loud. Phew, you're really absent from the real world. But in a cool, happy place.

Hmm, has kind...â€

â€œHuckleberry (blueberry/cherry pie cross)
is the best body high Iâ€™ve come across, it feels like after-sex. Which is fucking awesome. And blueberry pie flavor is 10/10 as well.  Well rounded perfect hybrid strainâ€
